harmony.title: InHarmony
harmony.description: InHarmony is a platform for volunteer support and donation collection. Users can not only make a one-time donation but also subscribe to monthly automatic donations. The site supports two languages — Ukrainian and English — and features a responsive, user-friendly interface.
features: One-time donations and monthly subscription system
Support for UA / EN languages
Payment system integration
Personal account and analytics for volunteers
Frontend with Next.js
Backend with Node.js
Fully responsive layout

full-stack.title: LLOYDJEFFERSON — personal website of a Fullstack developer
full-stack.description: Interactive personal website of developer Lloyd Jefferson with the ability to switch between light and dark themes. The site includes information about me, my projects, contacts, and client reviews. The project demonstrates a professional approach, responsive design, and modern interactivity.
features: Light and dark theme with smooth switching
Sections: About Me, Projects, Contacts, Reviews
Interactive contact form with message sending functionality
Responsive layout working correctly on various devices
Client reviews with quotes and names
Social media icons with links
Use of pure JavaScript and CSS without frameworks

diet-today.title: VeggieBoost — organic vegetable delivery
diet-today.description: VeggieBoost is a landing page presentation of an online organic vegetable delivery service. The project demonstrates basket ordering functionality with farm products, easy navigation, and pleasant UI design. The main idea is to show users the simplicity of ordering and the quality of the products.
features: Interactive interface with sections: How It Works, Vegetables, Contacts
Simulation of online store functionality with product selection and order placement
Modern animation and smooth scrolling
List of vegetables with prices, icons, and order buttons
Basic responsiveness for various devices

glasses.title: Learn Lingo
glasses.description: Learn Lingo is a web app for a company providing online language tutoring services. Users can register, log into their account, view tutor profiles, add tutors to favorites, and book trial lessons.
features: Registration and login via Firebase Authentication
Viewing and filtering tutors by language, level, and hourly price
Adding tutors to favorites list saved after page reload
Detailed tutor information with reviews and ratings
Modal windows for registration, login, and booking lessons with form validation
Animations for smooth element appearance
Interactive pagination and a 'Load More' button

book.title: Read Journey
book.description: Read Journey is a web app for book lovers that allows users to register, find recommended books, add them to their personal library, and track their reading progress. The platform supports responsive design for convenient use on any device.
features: Registration, login, and logout with automatic redirection
Viewing recommended books with pagination and filters
Managing personal library: adding, removing, marking books as read
Tracking reading progress with journaling and statistics
Interactive modals for adding books, viewing details, and managing reading
Fully responsive design for mobile, tablets, and desktops
Backend integration for data storage and real-time updates
